description:
Despite http://anidb.net/ch109857 [Sherlock] recognizing that http://anidb.net/ch116686 [Irene] is dealing with the Lord of Crime, he sees her off. Irene negotiates with the Lord of Crime in an abandoned church, but before she can turn over the papers, Sherlock arrives, and makes a deal to keep Irene safe.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Scandal in the British Empire Act 3
大英帝国の醜聞 第三幕
